steps.title: OpenStax Tutor reading assignments
steps.body: Reading assignments include book content, formative questions, and one to three spaced practice questions per section of the book.
[best practices icon]: Make reading assignments due before you cover the topic in class to help your students prepare.

steps.title: Build a reading assignment
steps.body: Ready to make a reading assignment? Fill in this form and click “Add readings.”

steps.title: First, select a chapter
steps.body: Select a chapter you want to assign, then scroll down and click “show problems.” Uncheck any sections you don’t want to cover.

steps.title: What will students get
steps.body: Your students will get formative and spaced practice questions from the sections you selected above. Remember: you can see all questions that OpenStax Tutor might use in the Question Library.

steps.title: Publish
steps.body: To schedule this reading assignment, click Publish.
